h4.a: Letter to Families for Intervention Programs

div.p: Please see letter for Intervention Programs...
Please contact msatechhelp@ap-schools.org for help with tech...
Please see attached Food First Pantry Flyer Mon, Wed, Thurs & Fri. 10am-12pm Tues 2-4p...
Mighty Writers Writing Contest April 27th-May 8th...
Please see attached letter....

2950 MEMPHIS STREET | PHILADELPHIA, PA 19134
P:215-291-4709 | F: 215-291-4754

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-4894 pum-theme-cutting-edge popmake-overlay auto_open click_open
pum-container popmake theme-4894 pum-responsive pum-responsive-medium responsive size-medium
div.div: All APS Schools will remain closed for the remainder of the Academic year.

p.b: Lindley Academy Charter is offering Grab-and-Go meals at: (9:00am-12:00pm)

div.p: Grab-and-go meals sites will continue to operate for all Philadelphia students at this time. Information is HERE.
Click HERE for a letter from APS to Families.
Click HERE for the APS Continuity of Learning Plan.
Click HERE for a letter on the updated instructional plan from the Memphis Street Academy Principal.
Click HERE for a letter for Families Regarding Intervention Programs in English.
Click HERE for a letter for Families Regarding Intervention Programs in Spanish.
Students/Families. Please access this link to sign into digital programs by clicking HERE.
For tips on how to protect yourself from Coronovirus visit https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prepare/prevention.html
Updates on State Testing visit https://www.media.pa.gov/Pages/Education-Details.aspx?newsid=813
For information on Comcast Internet Essentials click HERE
